statements: SELECT * FROM Ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC
SELECT ingredient_name, available_quantity FROM Ingredients WHERE available_quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM Ingredients WHERE unit_of_measurement = 'g' LIMIT 5
SELECT ingredient_id, ingredient_name FROM Ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_id DESC
SELECT ingredient_name, minimum_stock_level FROM Ingredients WHERE minimum_stock_level < 10
SELECT * FROM Ingredients WHERE available_quantity > 100 ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT ingredient_id, ingredient_name, unit_of_measurement FROM Ingredients WHERE minimum_stock_level < 50 ORDER BY available_quantity ASC;
SELECT ingredient_name, available_quantity, minimum_stock_level FROM Ingredients WHERE unit_of_measurement = 'oz' ORDER BY available_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Ingredients WHERE available_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY minimum_stock_level ASC;
SELECT ingredient_name, unit_of_measurement FROM Ingredients WHERE available_quantity < 50 AND minimum_stock_level < 20 ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_inventory ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC;
SELECT id, ingredient_name, current_quantity FROM ingredient_inventory WHERE current_quantity > 100;
SELECT ingredient_name, restock_threshold FROM ingredient_inventory WHERE restock_threshold <= 10;
SELECT id, ingredient_name, current_quantity, restock_threshold FROM ingredient_inventory WHERE current_quantity < restock_threshold;
SELECT * FROM restock_log ORDER BY restock_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_inventory WHERE current_quantity > restock_threshold;
SELECT ingredient_name, current_quantity FROM ingredient_inventory ORDER BY current_quantity DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, current_quantity, restock_threshold FROM ingredient_inventory WHERE current_quantity < restock_threshold ORDER BY restock_threshold DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredient_inventory JOIN restock_log ON ingredient_inventory.id = restock_log.ingredient_id;

SELECT ingredient_name, restock_quantity, restock_date FROM ingredient_inventory JOIN restock_log ON ingredient_inventory.id = restock_log.ingredient_id WHERE restock_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, unit_of_measurement FROM Ingredients WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT ingredient_name, unit_of_measurement, supplier_id FROM Ingredients ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT ingredient_name, reason FROM Ingredients JOIN Stockouts ON Ingredients.ingredient_id = Stockouts.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM Ingredients WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC
SELECT ingredient_name, unit_of_measurement FROM Ingredients JOIN Suppliers ON Ingredients.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'ABC%'

SELECT ingredient_name, supplier_name, contact_info FROM Ingredients JOIN Suppliers ON Ingredients.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id JOIN Stockouts ON Ingredients.ingredient_id = Stockouts.ingredient_id WHERE Stockouts.stockout_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(ingredient_id) AS total_ingredients FROM Suppliers LEFT JOIN Ingredients ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Ingredients.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM Ingredients
SELECT * FROM Ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, current_stock FROM Ingredients WHERE current_stock < 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT ingredient_name, unit_of_measure FROM Ingredients JOIN Stockouts ON Ingredients.ingredient_id = Stockouts.ingredient_id WHERE stockout_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM Ingredients;
SELECT ingredient_name, current_stock FROM Ingredients WHERE current_stock > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT ingredient_name, current_stock FROM Ingredients WHERE current_stock <= 10 ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM Ingredients JOIN Orders ON Ingredients.ingredient_id = Orders.ingredient_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT ingredient_name, stock_level FROM ingredients WHERE stock_level > 0;
SELECT supplier_name FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, stock_level FROM ingredients WHERE stock_level < 10 ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT order_id, ingredient_id, supplier_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name ASC, stock_level DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Inc%';
SELECT order_id, ingredient_name, quantity FROM orders JOIN ingredients ON orders.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(stock_level) AS avg_stock_level FROM stock_history WHERE stock_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ingredient_name, alert_message FROM ingredients INNER JOIN alerts ON ingredients.ingredient_id = alerts.ingredient_id WHERE alert_level > 2 ORDER BY ingredient_name;
